name: Sensible World of Soccer 2022-23
overview: It appears that the fansite SensibleSoccer.de has put together an updated version of the game for Amiga (as spotted by UltimateMister), adding the correct player names and team numbers for the 2022/2023 season. This means you can still enjoy the same fantastic gameplay of the classic Amiga title while also having the benefit of more up-to-date team sheets.
